function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perceived impact of COVID-19 decreasing over time","Impact":"Misjudging the actual impact of COVID-19 can lead to complacency and inadequate measures to control its spread","Mitigation":"Regularly assess and update the perception of COVID-19 impact, and maintain vigilance in implementing preventive measures","Technologies":"Data analytics and tracking tools for real-time monitoring","People":"Professionals in the construction industry","Owner":"Industry associations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Descending trend in the level of concern for COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced concern may lead to neglect of safety protocols and increased risk of transmission","Mitigation":"Conducting regular safety training and awareness campaigns, emphasizing the ongoing threat of COVID-19","Technologies":"Virtual training platforms, communication apps for outreach","People":"Professionals in the construction industry","Owner":"Employers, industry organizations"},{"Description":"Incorrect prediction of return to normalcy","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions can lead to inadequate planning for long-term adjustments and resource allocation","Mitigation":"Regularly review and update return-to-normalcy projections based on current data and expert guidance","Technologies":"Scenario planning and predictive modeling tools","People":"Professionals in the construction industry","Owner":"Project managers, industry analysts"}]}
